title: MachineGam
author: MachineGam
content: I have VLX Velas and they gave me 100 vlx when I registered in coinpayments, it's been a long time, I don't know what I should change, but I don't know where I can change it or what do you recommend?

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Are you referring to this VLX https://coinmarketcap.com/ru/currencies/velas/? If yes, you can exchange it many places, for example https://coinmarketcap.com/ru/currencies/velas/markets/. KuCoin, for example, has no KYC and you can freely deposit and withdraw your money to any wallet there. Uniswap also has support for this coin, but I don't know how liquid it is.
